name: Wrongful interference with officers
text: §143-17  Wrongful interference with officers.  It shall be unlawful for any person to resist or obstruct any officer in the exercise of the officer's duties as provided in this chapter. [L 1941, c 268, §15; RL 1945, §7166; RL 1955, §156-17; HRS §143-17; gen ch 1985]
